description:
Replacement LifeStraw filters for your Camelbak filtered-water bottle.

  • Treats up to 4000L (varies with water quality)
  • Filters to 0.2 microns
  • Removes up to 99.99999% of waterborne bacteria and up to 99.9% of waterborne protozoan cysts
  • Replaceable ion exchange filter reduces chlorine, bad tastes and odours, as well as organic chemical matter like pesticides, herbicides, and VOCs (good for 100L)
  • Small fits 600ml bottles
  • Medium fits 1L bottles
name: CamelBak LifeStraw Bottle Filter Set
